title: UK-China Natural Products for Biopesticides: Developing Partnerships for Exploiting Insecticidal Proteins Produced by Arthropods
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
findingsText: Better understanding of immune responses in insects Chinese partner currently proceeding with research in this area aimed at crop protection Agriculture, Food and Drink
